## [The R Workshop Book](https://www.r-workshop.org/)

By Rebecca L. Barter

Added Thu Feb 20, 2025

**What is this?**

**The R Workshop Book** is designed to help beginners learn R for data analysis, focusing on tabular data manipulation and visualization using the tidyverse. It serves as a companion to workshops originally developed and taught at the University of Utah, covering R fundamentals, data frames, and visualization with ggplot2.

1.  Link to book here: <https://www.r-workshop.org/>
